query:
UPDATE internal.tasks SET
            heartbeat = '0001-01-01T00:00:00Z',
            inbox = $3::JSON[] || inbox_next,
            inbox_next = NULL,
            inner_state = $2::JSON,
            wake_at =
                CASE WHEN inbox_next IS NOT NULL
                THEN NOW()
                ELSE NOW() + $4::INTERVAL
                END
        WHERE task_id = $1
        RETURNING wake_at IS NULL AS "suspended!"
